TopicTitle: Industrial Flames & Explosions, Inc. - Version 1.4.2 Now Available!

Articles.Content:
does the current version 1.4.2 work on ksp .16?

as when i load a ship it says something not with current version?

Go into the ship .craft file and change version=0.15.2 to version=0.16.0

Not guaranteed to have the same parts since many things changed since .14 but its a temporary fix

Version 1.4.2 does work in KSP 0.15 but ships built in previous versions will not load. Changing the version in the ship does work, but often causes problems. The best way is to build those ships again.
cheers for the replies, ill try that fix after work!
I made a program which converts Ships to 0.16 automatically, that could help you.

I made a program which converts Ships to 0.16 automatically, that could help you.

I wouldn\'t mind that program...
Is it only for me, or the SLS is hard to fly? The first SRB stage requires constant trajectory updates.

I wouldn\'t mind that program...

i second that, where is the download link? 8)

Is it only for me, or the SLS is hard to fly? The first SRB stage requires constant trajectory updates.

Thats right, the SAS isn\'t working...

PS: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=17259.0 Ship Updater
I built the rocket from scratch, so why i should convert the files?
Well it didn\'t work perfectly but it got the ships to load in .16, now I just have to realin some things. Thanks a bunch for this!

I see that my favorite mod isn\'t going to die, even if the original designer isn\'t updating. I don\'t know if it\'s the fact that I did my first mun landing with the SLS, or if it\'s the fact that this is just one hell of a mod, but I really love this pack. If Jordan isn\'t updating, then I guess the community will take it up. Thanks guys. I think you guys all deserve a cookie. Also, don\'t forget about the other ships, the Intrepid II and V. They\'re good too. Even though it does have completed ships, and that isn\'t too fun if you like to build things, this mod shouldn\'t be allowed to die out. Ever.

Greetings Friends,

It has been a wonderful journey building these rockets that so many of you have come to love so much. Unfortunately, all things must come to an end... Since January, I've been working two full-time jobs trying to support my family. Whenever I start to see the light at the end of the tunnel in hopes of once again designing and developing rockets for KSP, I end up falling more and more behind. And with each KSP update, my rockets become crippled and unusable. With that, I am officially shutting down Industrial Flames & Explosions, Inc. Please allow IFE, Inc. to die gracefully. I do not want ANYONE to continue development. This has been my baby from the start, and I plan to keep it that way. If you want to build your own Ares I, SLS, Atlas V, or Altair Lander, you are more than welcome to. Just don’t use these parts or textures.

To the Mods: You have my authorization to delete, lock, suspend, or whatever you need to do to remove this thread completely. I trust that if you find anyone attempting to re-release or continue development using any of these parts, you will take the necessary steps to stop their efforts.

There will be a day when Industrial Flames & Explosions, Inc. returns bigger and better than ever, but it ‘tis not this day. Until then, dream bigger, build harder, and fly faster.

JordanCox2

Edited August 4, 2012 by JordanCox2

Working two fulltime jobs in order to support your family is a hard thing to do. Not much time remains for hobby's or other activities. I hope things will turn for the better for you. As one of the fan's of this pack, this is a sad day for me. I can fully inderstand that you want to stay in control of your brainchild. Many of my crafts are built with or around your pack. I hope it still is allowed to use it as it is now. Good luck!
Why being all dramatic and stuff, be happy dont worry
